description: Comfortable t-shirt in 100% organic cotton and comfort fit. Logo print with integrated Kånken Art design by renowned Swedish designer/artist Martin Ander, aka ‘Mander’, who draws our attention to the small intricate patterns that can be found in nature. Part of Fjällräven’s Arctic Fox Initiative, where part of sales go to environment and climate projects.
name: Fjallraven Kanken Art T-Shirt - Mens
